title: Standing Ovation!
instructions: All the other family members will applaud and cheer while you take a bow.

title: Sandwich hug!
instructions: You're the filling! (A “Sandwich Hug” is where 2 people hug and squish a third person in the middle.)

title: High Fives!
instructions: You get high fives from your fellow family members

title: Toad's Stool.
instructions: You sit on a stool and say “I'm the best!” And listen to each family member say one thing they love about you.

title: Skip it - Skip it real good.
instructions: You have to skip once around the house singing a silly song.

title: Sing A Song of Sixpence.
instructions: Recite “Sing a song of sixpence” or another favorite nursery rhyme.

title: Dizzy Dizzy Dinosaur.
instructions: Take a Dinosaur pose and twirl around 5 times fast.

title: Robot Rest Time.
instructions: Lie down: You are a robot who has been switched off.  Everybody gets to poke you to find your “On” switch.

title: High Tea Time.
instructions: Sing “I’m a little teapot” in the highest voice you can.  Pose and tilt to pour out your tea.

title: Wide-Mouth Frog.
instructions: Until your next turn, you are the wide-mouthed frog, and can only speak Loudly, opening your mouth wide for each syllable.

title: Music Master.
instructions: If you play an instrument, play a song on it.  If not, sing one.

title: Animal Action.
instructions: If you have a pet, give it some love.  If not, pose like an animal and make the appropriate sounds.

title: Dancing Queen.
instructions: Put a crown (or a hat, or anything) on your head and Dance for 60 seconds.
